properties.body:
STRAIT OF SICILY.
PELAGIE ISLANDS.
VESSEL SANK VICINITY LAMPIONE (35-33N 012-19E).
PERSONS MISSING. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
